data: Timbie, Peter T Peter T Timbie pttimbie@wisc.edu (608) 890-2002 6209 Chamberlin Hall Observational Cosmology Group Astrophysics Observational cosmology. Precision measurements of the 2.7 K cosmic microwave background radiation. Searches for gravitational waves from inflation using CMB polarization. Superconducting microwave and millimeter-wave detectors. Studies of large-scale structure with 21-cm tomography. Receiver development for radio astronomy. Cryogenics. Directions to room 6209, Chamberlin Hall or stairs to the 6th floor. Facing into the hallway, away from the two elevators, turn right. Follow the hallway to room 6209, which will be on your left.
